title: Castle Clinton National Monument: Kids & Youth
body: Kids & Youth          Become a WebRanger! It takes a lot to preserve and protect America's natural and historic treasures. We need your help to keep all of our parks safe and beautiful. Become a National Park Service WebRanger, and see just how much fun learning can be! 'WebRangers' is the National Park Service's online Junior Ranger program. It allows children everywhere to discover America's national parks, even though they may not be able to physically visit them.
